metadata.description: Traditional and organic remedies for crop diseases in Kenya
metadata.focus: Affordable, accessible treatments for smallholder farmers

remedies.name: Neem Oil Spray
remedies.local_name_swahili: Dawa ya Mafuta ya Mti wa Neem
remedies.instructions: Mix 2 tablespoons of neem oil with 1 liter of water and a few drops of soap. Spray on affected plants in the evening.
remedies.instructions_swahili: Changanya vijiko vikubwa 2 vya mafuta ya neem na lita 1 ya maji na matone machache ya sabuni. Nyunyiza kwenye mimea iliyoathiriwa jioni.
remedies.precautions: Do not spray during hot sunny periods. Test on small area first.
remedies.precautions_swahili: Usiinyunyize wakati wa jua kali. Jaribu kwenye eneo dogo kwanza.

remedies.name: Garlic and Onion Spray
remedies.local_name_swahili: Dawa ya Kitungu Saumu na Kitungu
remedies.instructions: Crush 4 garlic cloves and 1 onion. Soak in 1 liter water for 24 hours. Strain and spray on plants.
remedies.instructions_swahili: Ponda karafuu 4 za kitungu saumu na kitungu 1. Loweka kwenye lita 1 ya maji kwa masaa 24. Chuja na unyunyize kwenye mimea.
remedies.precautions: Use fresh preparation. Avoid during flowering.
remedies.precautions_swahili: Tumia dawa mpya. Epuka wakati wa ua.

remedies.name: Wood Ash Treatment
remedies.instructions: Dust wood ash around plant base and on leaves early morning when dew is present.
remedies.instructions_swahili: Nyunyiza majivu ya mti karibu na mzizi wa mmea na kwenye majani asubuhi na mapema wakati kuna umande.

ingredients.source: From cooking fire or burned wood

remedies.precautions: Use ash from clean burning wood only. Avoid over-application.
remedies.precautions_swahili: Tumia majivu ya kuni safi tu. Epuka kutumia kupita kiasi.

remedies.name: Baking Soda Spray
remedies.instructions: Mix 1 teaspoon baking soda with 1 liter water and few drops of soap. Spray weekly.
remedies.instructions_swahili: Changanya kijiko kidogo 1 cha soda ya kupika na lita 1 ya maji na matone machache ya sabuni. Nyunyiza kila wiki.
remedies.precautions: Test on small area first. Don't use in very hot weather.
remedies.precautions_swahili: Jaribu kwenye eneo dogo kwanza. Usitumie wakati wa joto kali.

remedies.name: Copper Sulfate Solution
remedies.instructions: Mix according to manufacturer's instructions. Apply with protective equipment.
remedies.instructions_swahili: Changanya kulingana na maelekezo ya mtengenezaji. Tumia na vifaa vya ulinzi.
remedies.precautions: Wear protective clothing. Follow withdrawal periods before harvest.
remedies.precautions_swahili: Vaa nguo za ulinzi. Fuata vipindi vya kusubiri kabla ya mavuno.

remedies.name: Tobacco Leaf Extract
remedies.instructions: Soak tobacco leaves in water for 24 hours. Strain and dilute 1:5 with water before spraying.
remedies.instructions_swahili: Loweka majani ya tumbaku kwenye maji kwa masaa 24. Chuja na loza 1:5 na maji kabla ya kunyunyiza.

ingredients.source: Local tobacco or buy dried leaves

remedies.precautions: Toxic to humans. Wash hands after use. Don't use near harvest.
remedies.precautions_swahili: Ni sumu kwa wanadamu. Osha mikono baada ya kutumia. Usitumie karibu na mavuno.

remedies.name: Marigold Companion Planting
remedies.local_name_swahili: Kupanda Pamoja na Ua la Marigold
remedies.instructions: Plant marigolds around crop edges and between rows to repel harmful insects.
remedies.instructions_swahili: Panda maua ya marigold karibu na ukingo wa mazao na kati ya mistari ili kuzuia wadudu waharibifu.
remedies.precautions: Ensure adequate spacing. Remove spent flowers regularly.
remedies.precautions_swahili: Hakikisha nafasi ya kutosha. Ondoa maua yaliyokauka mara kwa mara.

remedies.name: Crop Rotation
remedies.instructions: Rotate crop families every season. Don't plant same family in same field for 2-3 years.
remedies.instructions_swahili: Zungusha familia za mazao kila msimu. Usipande familia moja katika shamba moja kwa miaka 2-3.
remedies.precautions: Plan rotations in advance. Keep records of what was planted where.
remedies.precautions_swahili: Panga mizunguko mapema. Hifadhi kumbukumbu za kilichopandwa wapi.

remedies.name: Compost Tea
remedies.instructions: Soak well-aged compost in water for 3-7 days. Strain and spray on plants.
remedies.instructions_swahili: Loweka mbolea iliyokomaa vizuri kwenye maji kwa siku 3-7. Chuja na unyunyize kwenye mimea.
remedies.precautions: Use only well-decomposed compost. Avoid during wet periods.
remedies.precautions_swahili: Tumia mbolea iliyooza vizuri tu. Epuka wakati wa mvua.

remedies.name: Milk and Water Spray
remedies.instructions: Mix 1 part milk with 10 parts water. Spray weekly on affected areas.
remedies.instructions_swahili: Changanya sehemu 1 ya maziwa na sehemu 10 za maji. Nyunyiza kila wiki kwenye maeneo yaliyoathiriwa.
remedies.precautions: Use fresh milk only. Apply in cool weather.
remedies.precautions_swahili: Tumia maziwa fresh tu. Tumia wakati wa hali ya baridi.

remedies.name: Improved Drainage
remedies.instructions: Create drainage channels, raised beds, or improve soil structure to prevent waterlogging.
remedies.instructions_swahili: Jenga mifereji ya maji, vitanda vilivyoinuliwa, au boresha muundo wa udongo ili kuzuia maji yasimame.
remedies.application_frequency: Once per season or as needed
remedies.precautions: Plan drainage to avoid erosion. Maintain channels regularly.
remedies.precautions_swahili: Panga mfereji ili kuepuka mmomonyoko. Tunza mifereji mara kwa mara.

remedies.name: Resistant Varieties
remedies.instructions: Plant disease-resistant crop varieties recommended for your area.
remedies.instructions_swahili: Panda aina za mazao zinazopinga magonjwa zilizopendekeza kwa eneo lako.
remedies.precautions: Buy from certified dealers. Store seeds properly.
remedies.precautions_swahili: Nunua kutoka kwa wauza walioidhiniwa. Hifadhi mbegu vizuri.

remedies.name: Early Planting
remedies.instructions: Plant at the beginning of rains to avoid peak pest periods and establish strong plants.
remedies.instructions_swahili: Panda mwanzoni mwa mvua ili kuepuka vipindi vya watu wa wadudu na kuimarisha mimea imara.
remedies.precautions: Monitor weather patterns. Prepare land in advance.
remedies.precautions_swahili: Fuatilia mifumo ya hali ya hewa. Andaa ardhi mapema.

remedies.name: Clean Cultivation
remedies.instructions: Remove plant debris, weed regularly, and maintain clean field conditions.
remedies.instructions_swahili: Ondoa mabaki ya mmea, palilia mara kwa mara, na tunza mazingira safi ya shamba.
remedies.precautions: Dispose of infected material away from fields. Compost only healthy residues.
remedies.precautions_swahili: Tupa vifaa vilivyoambukizwa mbali na mashamba. Tengeneza mbolea kutoka kwa mabaki mazuri tu.

remedies.name: Bio-pesticide (Bt)
remedies.instructions: Apply biological pesticides containing Bacillus thuringiensis according to label instructions.
remedies.instructions_swahili: Tumia dawa za kibiolojia zenye Bacillus thuringiensis kulingana na maelekezo kwenye lebo.
remedies.precautions: Follow label instructions carefully. Safe for beneficial insects.
remedies.precautions_swahili: Fuata maelekezo ya lebo kwa uangalifu. Ni salama kwa wadudu wafaidi.
